name: Evie (itch)
description:
A girl crashed into a dark forest not knowing where to go, curiosity drives her to open a Pandora’s box that was never meant to be opened.

Evie is a short first-person horror narrative that unfolds a mind-boggling event, set in the middle of an eerie forest that was left undiscovered for good reasons. The story starts off by reading diaries left in an abandoned house by a lady named Evie. As a player, you will quickly realize that great tragedies hit her life and uncontrollably fell into a downward spiral of despair.

This game was a 3 months project made by Yasuka Taira (me) and Kensuke Hayashi (HS student and a student of mine.)
Kensuke helped me write the story (diaries and documents.)
I did all the visuals and designing.
Shoutout to everyone who's helped us :D

Due to my work and Kensuke's school, we were only working on it for 3 hours a day. Some days we just wanted to take a rest :P
Unfortunately, we didn't have a programmer so the game might not be perfect, but we believe we did our best to make it happen.

Hope you enjoy it :D

This game is available in English and Japanese.

DISCLAIMERS:
This game might contain disturbing scenes. The characters do not reflect person's life.
